answers.answer: Bring some snacks with you to the gym. Strenuous exercise lowers glucose levels. Eat a snack with lots of water b4 your workout, and possibly during so you don't get the shakes. You should test just before working out, during and directly after working out.And 92 mg/dl is considered normal.

question: my question is, im type 2 diabetes, in the morning my glucose is 135mg, but when i go to the gym to exercise for about a hour i start feeling shaked and i go home and test my glucose it is in 92 mg.what can i do.
title: exercise
